topic.title: ZeroNet vs the JIDF
topic.body:
Sooner or later, the yids are going to find a reason to attack this place and try to suppress the truth about jewish crime around the world.

What can ZeroNet do to neutralize them?

http://www.thejidf.org/

1_1PRsmkcDcCnKbCfFTeQizKYcDpNn98iQcT.body:
日本語の勉強するつもりだったけど仕事を遅くまでしました。
残念でした。

昔、アメリカの店で日本からの商品がたくさんあったけど、最近韓国からの商品の方ご多くってちょっと悲しいです。

日本のtechはどうしてきえてしまったの？

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=FoA9M8Wobfg

(HD) 江ノ島電鉄 （江ノ島→稲村ヶ崎）

いつか乗ってみたい。

> [sakurausagi](#comment_2_1LULvTHohZntzro3v8f4MpWrVtnpVAbS4y): 太文字、どうやって打つのですか？？

https://github.com/HelloZeroNet/ZeroTalk/blob/master/js/lib/marked.min.js

Markdownを使っているみたい。

# H1

## H2

### H3

#### H4

**bold** / *italic* 　…かな？

毎週日本の新しいCMを見ています。いつも楽しみに待っています。

https://www.youtube.com/user/JPCMHD

9_1MxdAjWgnqwCaunGHmhY39tVR51qV3peJL.body: There should be a Slack clone for ZeroNet.

1_17ApQKugX1XH727gpAeD3mrRLjLxASdakd.body:
> [ekaterina](#comment_74_1Mk5sVKeCrwMc3wSD11jM7DZTiqF5D9BaD): To make this scalable a feature called "merger sites" needs to be implemented first, basically every profile becomes it's own ZeroNet site so you only download and seed the content from people you follow.

This is pure genius.

1_1Fq3t6PHAb11a4DHQavbevpx8v8BAEsxi8.body:
## 9/11 Missing Links

This movie presents a mountain of evidence that implicates Israel and many non-Israeli Jews in 9/11 and other false flag operations.  Watching all of it will leave you with no doubt about who was responsible for 9/11.  However, even watching bits and pieces of this film is highly educational and recommended.

To help new and old viewers alike, I've compiled a list of links that will take you directly to interesting points in this movie.

* [00:01:45](http://www.youtube.co.uk/watch?v=3qFa9_JjlYc#t=1m45s) Lavon Affair - a proven Israeli false flag operation
* [00:02:13](http://www.youtube.co.uk/watch?v=3qFa9_JjlYc#t=2m13s) False Flag Operation - a definition
* [00:02:53](http://www.youtube.co.uk/watch?v=3qFa9_JjlYc#t=2m53s) **[Sayanim](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sayanim)** - the word Wikipedia doesn't want you to know.
* [00:05:14](http://www.youtube.co.uk/watch?v=3qFa9_JjlYc#t=5m14s) USS Liberty - another proven Israeli false flag operation
* [00:15:08](http://www.youtube.co.uk/watch?v=3qFa9_JjlYc#t=15m8s) President John F. Kennedy's last request to us:  "...I am asking your help in the tremendous task of informing and alerting the American people. For I have complete confidence in the response and dedication of our citizens whenever they are fully informed."
* [00:18:08](http://www.youtube.co.uk/watch?v=3qFa9_JjlYc#t=18m8s) The Project for a New American Century and the origin of its policies.  There was a document called "A Clean Break" of Israeli origin that was later refined by the same Jewish authors in a document called "Rebuilding America's Defenses".
* [00:19:20](http://www.youtube.co.uk/watch?v=3qFa9_JjlYc#t=19m20s) **Neoconservatism is Jewish in origin.**
* [00:30:58](http://www.youtube.co.uk/watch?v=3qFa9_JjlYc#t=30m58s) Dancing Israelis
* [00:42:30](http://www.youtube.co.uk/watch?v=3qFa9_JjlYc#t=42m30s) Odigo, Instant Messaging, and proof of Israeli prior knowledge
* [00:44:35](http://www.youtube.co.uk/watch?v=3qFa9_JjlYc#t=44m35s) Goldman Sachs and prior knowledge
* [00:45:14](http://www.youtube.co.uk/watch?v=3qFa9_JjlYc#t=45m14s) ICTS and how they were in charge of airport security at all the airports the hijacked planes flew out of
* [00:46:50](http://www.youtube.co.uk/watch?v=3qFa9_JjlYc#t=46m50s) **Israeli Companies Immune to 9/11 Lawsuits (thanks to the Patriot Act)**
* [00:48:09](http://www.youtube.co.uk/watch?v=3qFa9_JjlYc#t=48m9s) ZIM Integrated Shipping Service - This Israeli company vacated the WTC complex just days before the attack.  It cost them $50,000 to break their lease.
* [00:52:46](http://www.youtube.co.uk/watch?v=3qFa9_JjlYc#t=52m46s) Alan D. Ratner, a jew and owner of Metals Management, sold the steel from the WTC rubble to a Chinese company.
* [01:00:14](http://www.youtube.co.uk/watch?v=3qFa9_JjlYc#t=1h0m14s) Special immigration exceptions that only Israelis get
* [01:02:36](http://www.youtube.co.uk/watch?v=3qFa9_JjlYc#t=1h2m36s) A LONG list of Israelis with dual citizenship in American government.
* [01:19:40](http://www.youtube.co.uk/watch?v=3qFa9_JjlYc#t=1h19m40s) Michael Chertoff, another jew, Secretary of Homeland Security, and the man behind the official 9/11 investigation
* [01:20:19](http://www.youtube.co.uk/watch?v=3qFa9_JjlYc#t=1h20m19s) The Chertoff family is one of the founding families of Israel.
* [01:21:45](http://www.youtube.co.uk/watch?v=3qFa9_JjlYc#t=1h21m45s) **Michael Chertoff was the true author of the Patriot Act**
* [01:22:30](http://www.youtube.co.uk/watch?v=3qFa9_JjlYc#t=1h22m30s) "This dual citizen of Israel with obvious loyalties not to the United States would be in direct control of events as they happened if martial law is ever declared on Americans."
* [01:24:44](http://www.youtube.co.uk/watch?v=3qFa9_JjlYc#t=1h24m44s) Kenneth Feinberg (jew), Victims Compensation Fund, $7 billion used to buy silence from 9/11 victims
* [01:25:49](http://www.youtube.co.uk/watch?v=3qFa9_JjlYc#t=1h25m49s) Alvin Hellerstein and Michael Mukasey, two judges who go the same synagogue, presided over all 9/11 victim lawsuits.  Tried to resolve cases as quickly as possible via payouts.
* [01:27:44](http://www.youtube.co.uk/watch?v=3qFa9_JjlYc#t=1h27m44s) Sheila Birnbaum (jew) handled the more "persistent" 9/11 victims
* [01:28:47](http://www.youtube.co.uk/watch?v=3qFa9_JjlYc#t=1h28m47s) Silverstein, Lowy, and Eisenberg
* [01:30:05](http://www.youtube.co.uk/watch?v=3qFa9_JjlYc#t=1h30m5s) Eisenberg negotiated the 99 year lease on the WTC complex 6 weeks before 9/11.
* [01:31:36](http://www.youtube.co.uk/watch?v=3qFa9_JjlYc#t=1h31m36s) Remote Control Technology / System Planning Corporation / CEO Dov Zakheim ...later became Undersecretary of Defense and Comptroller of the Pentagon.  He was also a coauthor of PNAC's paper, Rebuilding America's Defenses.
* [01:34:35](http://www.youtube.co.uk/watch?v=3qFa9_JjlYc#t=1h34m35s) PTECH: The Backdoor / Computer Security Issues
* [01:42:38](http://www.youtube.co.uk/watch?v=3qFa9_JjlYc#t=1h42m38s) Sears Tower & Mossad
* [01:45:12](http://www.youtube.co.uk/watch?v=3qFa9_JjlYc#t=1h45m12s) **Mexico Mossad Operation** - a tale of two Mossad agents who were caught trying to blow up the Mexican Congress on October 10, 2001.  Mexicans were in disbelief when these two were released by the Mexican government after Israel applied heavy pressure on them.
* [01:51:27](http://www.youtube.co.uk/watch?v=3qFa9_JjlYc#t=1h51m27s) Former Italian President, Francesco Cossiga, openly stated that intelligence agencies around the world KNEW that Mossad was responsible for 9/11.
* [01:52:21](http://www.youtube.co.uk/watch?v=3qFa9_JjlYc#t=1h52m21s) Even More Missing Links - As long as this movie may be, consider that the original script was over 5 hours long.  Here, a quick overview is given of topics that couldn't be covered in more depth in this film.
* [02:03:40](http://www.youtube.co.uk/watch?v=3qFa9_JjlYc#t=2h3m40s) Thanks and Credits
